QuestData.Title: A Centurion Without a Cause
QuestData.RewardText: This jungle will kill me and I will not return to cower at the mercy of Mar'gok!$b$bI am a veteran of several wars and campaigned on two continents now. If you have a war worth joining, I will serve for a time.$b$bAt least until I can kill the Sorcerer-King!
